    Reference

    All functions

    add_gene_locations_to_seurat()

    Add gene genomic location to seurat object

    callAlleleSpecificCN()

    Call allele specific copy number in single cell datasets

    callAlleleSpecificCNfromHSCN()

    Call allele specific copy number in single cell datasets

    callHaplotypeSpecificCN()

    Call haplotype specific copy number in single cell datasets

    coord_to_arm()

    Genomic coordinate to chromosome arm

    getBins()

    Make fixed-width bins

    plotBAFperstate()

    Plot BAF distributions per allele specific state

    plotCNprofile()

    Plot a single cell copy number profile

    plotCNprofileBAF()

    Plot a single cell allele specific copy number profile

    plotHeatmap()

    Heatmap plot

    plot_clusters_used_for_phasing()

    Plot clusters used for phasing

    rephasebins()

    Rephase haplotype copy number

    scale_color_scCN()

    Colour scale constructor for scCN (single cell Copy Number) colors

    scale_fill_scCN()

    Fill scale constructor for scCN (single cell Copy Number) colors
